name: Border Wall - Donald Trump Free Edition
name_original: Border Wall - Donald Trump Free Edition
description:
Border Wall is a political satire strategy/puzzle game. Destroy blocks in the huuuge border wall while keeping Trump from falling off the wall. If you can destroy blocks in the right way Trump will land on the metal block where you can zap him to turn him into a zombie.

FEATURES:
> 90 challenging levels
> Employ strategy to get the character onto the metal block
> If character falls onto the ground you're fired!
> Tap button to turn character into zombie and move to the next level

This game is for entertainment purposes and is in good fun for enjoyment by both sides of the political aisle.
